bug.description:
I wrote this test and ran it twice to trigger the mutation warning: <denchmark-code>import streamlit as st
list = [1, 2, 3] @st.cache() def return_global(): global list return list
var = return_global() var.append(4) st.show(var) </denchmark-code>
This is the warning I got: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/709022/66940733-521cea80-effa-11e9-87b5-180b2e0f1913.png></denchmark-link>
The first suggestion is telling me to change some line inside the streamlit caching file itself, which is surely not what's intended. Originally posted by @tconkling in #422 (comment)
